offerAndAcceptance.offer: Certain representations and warranties of ET regarding the transactions contemplated by the Merger Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Agreement among the Partnership, Parent, and ET.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties intend to create a binding legal agreement.

consideration.description: Entry into the Support Agreement as a material inducement for the merger.
consideration.value: Implied value through mutual representations and warranties.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: The parties intend to be legally bound by this Agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The Agreement is legal and is governed by the laws of Delaware.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Merger contemplated by the Merger Agreement.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Effective Time subject to conditions, around April 22, 2025.

contract.consent: The parties have mutually consented to the terms of the Agreement.

durationAndTermination.duration: Automatically terminates at Support Agreement Termination Date.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Conditions outlined for termination based on occurrence of events or mutual agreement.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Subject to mutual agreement on conditions.
